body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Sean James and I represent Sparkle Autos, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you Beverly. To assist you further, could you please provide me with your email address and contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is bbutler@example.com and my contact number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Beverly. Rest assured, I will review your case and get back to you promptly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Sean. I've been feeling disappointed about the returns process at Sparkle Autos.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Beverly.  We strive to provide excellent customer service and I will make sure your concerns are addressed.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Sean. I hope we can find a resolution soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Beverly. Your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you for taking the time to discuss this with me.
